name: ffuf
author: ffuf
description: Fast web fuzzer written in Go

name: fuzzdb
author: fuzzdb-project
description: Dictionary of attack patterns and primitives for black-box application fault injection and resource discovery.

name: IntruderPayloads
author: 1N3
description: A collection of Burpsuite Intruder payloads, BurpBounty payloads, fuzz lists, malicious file uploads and web pentesting methodologies and checklists.

name: fuzzapi
author: Fuzzapi
description: Fuzzapi is a tool used for REST API pentesting and uses API_Fuzzer gem

name: qsfuzz
author: ameenmaali
description: qsfuzz (Query String Fuzz) allows you to build your own rules to fuzz query strings and easily identify vulnerabilities

name: vaf
author: d4rckh
description: very advanced (web) fuzzer written in Nim
